translation.en: In New York City, there's a fine line between law and chaos.

再跟我说说
我怎么会决定上到车顶来！

-啊-哦！
-我讨厌你说"啊-哦！"

translation.en: Whoa, hey!

是的，警探，我是瑞克格瑞森

translation.en: Why don't we let New York City answer that question?

translation.en: The greatest city on Earth, yeah!

translation.en: No comment.

translation.en: But, yes.

translation.en: Danson and Highsmith, free hot dogs for life!

translation.en: We know, we know. We know.

好吧

现在因为我的表情让你感觉不爽

是法医会计部

translation.en: All right.

-不，你不需要

-32

-砰，砰
-耶

-好的
-耶

所有的弹子，高度压力

-妈的

他们像是问："你怎么从来
没在办公室里开过枪呢？"

translation.en: Good point.
translation.zh: 说得好

translation.en: I'm sorry, I don't follow.
translation.zh: 不好意思，我没明白

translation.en: -You've never fired in the office. -We all have. It's called a desk pop.
translation.zh:
你从来没有在办公室里开过枪 我们都开过，你知道
那叫办公桌开枪

translation.en: -Fellas, I know you don't respect me. -Not true.
translation.zh:
伙计们，看，我明白你们并不尊重
我这样一个警官

translation.en: I'm not stupid. I'm not gonna discharge my firearm in the office.
translation.zh:
-不是的
-我不蠢 我不会在办公室里开枪

translation.en: Listen. I'll try to make it clear.
translation.zh:
甘布尔，听我说
我说得清楚一些

translation.en: We honor the flag, you crap on it when you don't shoot your gun in the office.
translation.zh:
我们敬仰国旗，你不在办公室里开枪
就是玷污了它

translation.en: Jimmy. When's the last time you had a desk pop?
translation.zh:
吉米
你上次办公桌开枪是什么时候？

translation.en: September '08.
translation.zh: 08年9月

translation.en: -Be a man. Do it. -Now.
translation.zh:
-像个男人，开枪
-现在

translation.en: -Please, do it. -Pop one off!
translation.zh:
-求你，开枪
-开一枪！

translation.en: -There you go. Pop it off! -Don't think, just go!
translation.zh:
-来吧，开枪
-别想了，开枪吧！

translation.en: -Here we go. -Do it, yes.
translation.zh:
-我们来了
-开枪，是的

translation.en: He did it!
translation.zh: 他开枪了！

translation.en: Hey! Shots fired!
translation.zh: 嘿！开枪了！

translation.en: Hey, Terry, I did it! I did my first desk pop!
translation.zh: 特里，我开枪了！我第一次办公桌开枪！

translation.en: It's a real thing, right?
translation.zh: 这是真的，是吧？

translation.en: -A desk pop? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-办公桌开枪？
-是的

translation.en: No, that's not real!
translation.zh: 不，那不是真的！

translation.en: They were so convincing in their argument, they swung me.
translation.zh: 他们太有说服力了，他们动摇了我

translation.en: You're gonna have to hand over your gun.
translation.zh:
好吧，艾伦
你得交出你的枪

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是的，长官

translation.en: Captain, you really wanna disarm this guy, take out the batteries in the calculator.
translation.zh:
长官，你真的想缴了他的枪
把电池从计算器里拿出来

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna give you this. A dummy gun. I use it for ceremony.
translation.zh:
好吧，给你这个
是把假枪，我在仪式的时候用

translation.en: There.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: You get this back when I feel you know how to handle it.
translation.zh:
当我觉得你知道如何使用它的时候
你可以取回这把枪

translation.en: Listen, guys. I'm working two jobs. I'm working here.
translation.zh:
听着，伙计们
我做两份工作，我在这儿工作

translation.en: And I got another job at Bed Bath and Beyond. Okay?
translation.zh:
我在床浴和超越店
还有另一份工作，好吗？

translation.en: I'm doing that just to put a kid through NYU...
translation.zh: 我那样做是为了供一个孩子读完纽约大学

translation.en: ...so he can explore his bisexuality and become a deejay.
translation.zh:
这样他就能开发他的双性恋
成为一个流行音乐节目主持人

translation.en: Now the last thing I need is a ballistics report in the unit.
translation.zh: 现在我最不想要的是一份弹道报告

translation.en: I'm just gonna ask you guys, please, come on.
translation.zh:
我只是请求你们
请，求你了，真的

translation.en: Just think about.... Just be smart.
translation.zh: 考虑一下...聪明点

translation.en: 211 in progress.
translation.zh: 211在线

translation.en: They're using a wrecking ball to clean out Castien Jewelry.
translation.zh: 他们用落锤破碎机洗劫加斯第安珠宝店

translation.en: All right, we got it.
translation.zh: 好的，收到

translation.en: -Good luck. Have a good one. -Allen, let's go.
translation.zh:
-好运，伙计们，好好干一场
-艾伦，我们走

translation.en: -No, I got work to do. -What? This is work!
translation.zh:
-不，我有事情要做
-什么？这是工作！

translation.en: Hey, yo! Danson and Highsmith. We roll in heavy.
translation.zh:
嘿，哟！丹森和海史密斯
我们马上就到

translation.en: You cream puffs, sit tight.
translation.zh: 你们这些懦夫，坐好了

translation.en: You gotta be shitting me!
translation.zh: 你们是在耍我！

translation.en: You can't keep me cooped up in here, okay?
translation.zh: 你们不能把我关在这儿，好吗？

translation.en: I am a peacock! You gotta let me fly!
translation.zh: 我是只孔雀！你该让我飞！

translation.en: Did he just...? Did he just call himself a peacock?
translation.zh:
他刚才...
他刚才是不是叫自己孔雀？

translation.en: Let's go! Let's go!
translation.zh: 快走！

translation.en: Come on, fellas! Wednesday night is taco night at Rikers Island!
translation.zh:
来吧，伙计们！ 雷克岛监狱星期三晚上
有墨西哥玉米卷吃！

translation.en: That's the second one this week!
translation.zh: 这是这个星期里的第二部车了！

translation.en: Hey, you monkeys! Stop!
translation.zh: 嘿，你们这群猴子！站住！

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 快跑！

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Heads up!
translation.zh: 小心！

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: Special Forces zip line.
translation.zh: 特种部队滑锁

translation.en: Cut that line! Cut it! Let's go!
translation.zh: 切断那锁！切断它！快！

translation.en: -These guys are pros. -Let's go!
translation.zh:
-这些家伙是职业的
-快！

translation.en: -You thinking what I'm thinking, partner? -Aim for the bushes.
translation.zh: 你跟我想的一样吗，搭档？ 为了荣耀

translation.en: Cops still argue to this day why Danson and Highsmith jumped.
translation.zh:
警察们直到今天仍然在争论
为什么丹森和海史密斯会跳下去

translation.en: Maybe it was just pride, having survived so many brushes with death.
translation.zh:
也许只是荣耀，经历多次死亡的洗礼
而活了下来

translation.en: Maybe their egos pushed them off.
translation.zh: 也许是自大促使他们跳了下去

translation.en: I don't know. But that shit was crazy.
translation.zh: 我不知道，但是那太疯狂了

translation.en: Either way, there was a hole in New York City, and it needed to be filled.
translation.zh:
无论哪种方式，纽约市有了窟窿
需要被填上

translation.en: Two days ago, this city wept.
translation.zh: 两天前，这座城市在哀悼

translation.en: We lost two heroes who gave everything for us...
translation.zh:
我们失去了给我们
带来一切的两位英雄

translation.en: ...who paid that ultimate sacrifice so that we may walk these streets safely.
translation.zh:
他们做出了最终的牺牲
使我们可以安心地走在大街上

translation.en: There wasn't even an awning.
translation.zh: 这里甚至没有遮篷

translation.en: -No, I know. -They just jumped 20 stories.
translation.zh:
-没有，我知道
-他们从20层跳了下去

translation.en: Doesn't make sense.
translation.zh: 说不通，不是吗？

translation.en: I only hope God lets them take their .357s with them to heaven.
translation.zh: 我只希望上帝让他们带着357手枪去天堂

translation.en: It's our moment, Allen. Our moment to step up and be the guys.
translation.zh:
到我们表现的时候了，艾伦
到我们站出来成为人物的时候了

translation.en: -We're at a funeral. Show some respect. -What?
translation.zh:
-我们正出席葬礼，表现出该有的尊重
-什么？

translation.en: You don't think every other detective isn't thinking the same thing?
translation.zh:
你不认为在场的所有其他警探
没有在想同样的事情吗？

translation.en: Allen, listen. Danson and Highsmith are gone.
translation.zh:
艾伦，听我说
丹森和海史密斯不在了

translation.en: Their desks are empty. Someone has to fill those seats.
translation.zh:
他们的办公桌空出来了
有人要坐那些位置

translation.en: That someone is us, okay? The city's dying for a hero.
translation.zh:
那是我们，好吗？
城市需要一个英雄

translation.en: -Is it? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-是的

translation.en: What about nine million socially-conscious and unified citizens...
translation.zh: 那九百万具有社会良知统一起来的市民

translation.en: ...stepping up and doing their part?
translation.zh: 都站出来做他们的事情怎么样？

translation.en: As a kid, didn't you dress up and play cops and robbers?
translation.zh:
在你小时候，你不会打扮来玩
警察和贼的游戏吗？

translation.en: I'll tell you what I did as a little kid.
translation.zh: 我来告诉你我小时候做了什么

translation.en: I went to school and made my bed.
translation.zh: 我上学，自己铺床

translation.en: And at age 11, I audited my parents.
translation.zh: 十一岁的时候，我查我爸妈的账

translation.en: And believe me, there were some discrepancies, and I was grounded.
translation.zh: 相信我，是有些差别的，我被禁足了

translation.en: What the hell are you?
translation.zh: 你究竟是什么鬼东西？

translation.en: Well, well, well. What do we got here?
translation.zh: 好吧，好吧，好吧，这是谁啊？

translation.en: Look at these two jamokes, would you? One shot Jeter, the other shot an office.
translation.zh:
看看这两个笨蛋，是吧？
一个开枪打了基特另一个开枪射了办公室

translation.en: Have some decorum. We're at a funeral.
translation.zh: 有点礼貌，我们正出席葬礼

translation.en: You wanna dance, brolio?
translation.zh: 想跳支舞吗，兄弟？

translation.en: I will rock your body with big, nasty hooks. You'll be pissing blood out of your ass.
translation.zh:
我会用巨大的狠狠的钩拳摇摆你的身体
从你的屁股里飙出血来

translation.en: -That's horrible. -Why don't you step back, man?
translation.zh: 太可怕了 你为什么不退回去，伙计？

translation.en: You touch him, I swear to God...
translation.zh: 你碰他，我对上帝发誓

translation.en: I'm gonna beat you with Allen's head.
translation.zh: 我会用艾伦的头把你打出屎来

translation.en: He's not gonna do that. Hyperbole. Weird example.
translation.zh:
他不会那样做的，那是夸张
但那是很奇怪的例子

translation.en: -You wanna go? -I wanna go!
translation.zh:
-你想试试？
-我想

translation.en: -Get him off. -Kick his ass.
translation.zh:
-把他放倒
-揍他，马丁

translation.en: Yeah. How do you like that?
translation.zh: 是的，你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: -Pull his hair! -I love it.
translation.zh:
-拽他的头发！
-我喜欢这样

translation.en: This hurts so good.
translation.zh: 这几下打得不错

translation.en: -Very sorry for your loss. -What a lovely hat.
translation.zh:
-为你失去亲人感到难过，女士
-多漂亮的帽子

translation.en: I love your shoes.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的鞋子

translation.en: -It's fine, it's fine. -Go, go.
translation.zh:
-不错，很好
-继续，继续

translation.en: Punish him!
translation.zh: 惩罚他！

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.zh: 哦，伙计

translation.en: Do it. That's how we do it in the hood.
translation.zh: 打啊，我们小时候就是这样打的

translation.en: -Punish him. -That's not even a move.
translation.zh:
-惩罚他
-那甚至都不是一个动作

translation.en: I'm the winner. I'm the winner, everybody saw.
translation.zh:
我是胜者
我赢了，大家都看到了

translation.en: What the hell is going on here?
translation.zh: 这到底发生了什么？

translation.en: Two good men are dead...
translation.zh: 两个好人死了

translation.en: ...and you guys are fighting over who's gonna be the next hotshot?
translation.zh: 你们却在为谁会成为下一个能人而打斗？

translation.en: -Is that what's happening? -That's what's happening.
translation.zh: 是这样吗？ 是的，正是这样

translation.en: Let me tell you about those guys.
translation.zh: 让我告诉你们关于那两个人的事情

translation.en: They knew that to become a good cop, you had to solve cases. Okay?
translation.zh:
他们知道要成为一个好警察
你们得破案，好吗？

translation.en: Okay, and maybe you start with the Castien robbery.
translation.zh: 好吧，也许你们从加斯第安劫案开始

translation.en: Okay? So just watch it.
translation.zh: 好吗？看着点

translation.en: Next time, me, you, library.
translation.zh: 下次，我和你，图书馆

translation.en: -Not even close. -Come on, guys. Come on.
translation.zh:
-甚至都不是接近
-来吧，伙计们，来吧

translation.en: -You are... -I'm the winner!
translation.zh:
-你是...
-我是胜者！

translation.en: I didn't need you to stick up for me. I could've handled that myself.
translation.zh:
我不需要你来替我说话，好吗？
我自己能解决

translation.en: Hey, don't flatter yourself. It's the partner's code. I had no choice.
translation.zh:
嘿，别吹捧你自己了
这是搭档的规矩，我别无选择

translation.en: Move.
translation.zh: 让开

translation.en: -Nine-fifteen, let's have a great day! -Cut the shit!
translation.zh:
-9:15，让我们度过美好的一天，大家！
-别废话了！

translation.en: Good morning.
translation.zh: 早上好！

translation.en: We've got shots fired. 509 East 10th Street.
translation.zh: 发生枪战，东第十大街509号

translation.en: Large amounts of cocaine on the scene. Try to stay out of trouble.
translation.zh: 现场有大量的可卡因 尽量别受伤，伙计们

translation.en: No chance you'd wanna go, right?
translation.zh: 你是不会想响应那个召唤的，是吧？

translation.en: No chance. Too busy.
translation.zh: 绝对不会，太忙了

translation.en: All right, ladies. Starting to get the picture? We're about to lock shit down.
translation.zh:
好吧，女士们，看明白了吗？
我们将会去控制局面

translation.en: -That's right. -Stay and get your type on.
translation.zh:
-是的
-你们小妞们待在这儿打字

translation.en: Go get them. Lot of energy, lot of focus.
translation.zh:
去抓他们吧，伙计们
充满能量，集中精神

translation.en: Shut up!
translation.zh: 闭嘴！

translation.en: Could I see you in the hallway for a second?
translation.zh: 艾伦，能和我到走廊里来一下吗？

translation.en: I'm super busy right now.
translation.zh: 我...我现在超级忙，特里

translation.en: No, no, I know. This'll be real quick.
translation.zh: 不，不，不，我知道，很快就好

translation.en: It's about the construction permits.
translation.zh: 是关于你所讲的建筑许可的问题

translation.en: -The scaffolding? -This is our thing, yeah.
translation.zh:
-那个脚手架违章？
-这是我们的事情，是的

translation.en: So, what do you got?
translation.zh: 那么，你了解到什么了？

translation.en: I got this! I'll put one right in your neck.
translation.zh: 这个！我会在你脖子上开一枪

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: Let's go. We're going to that call.
translation.zh: 走吧，我们去现场

translation.en: -What is this? -Shut up.
translation.zh:
-这是什么？
-闭嘴

translation.en: We're going to the car, and going after this case.
translation.zh:
我们去开车
我们要跟这个案子

translation.en: -You're not gonna shoot me. -I won't?
translation.zh:
-你不会开枪射我的
-我不会？

translation.en: -No. -I shot Jeter.
translation.zh:
-不会
-我射了基特

translation.en: -That was an accident. -Was it?
translation.zh:
-那是个意外
-是吗？

translation.en: -Now move. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-现在走吧
-好吧

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Does anybody see this? He's got a gun on me.
translation.zh:
有人看见吗？
他拿枪对着我

translation.en: I'm being kidnapped.
translation.zh: 我被绑架了

translation.en: Really, we're in a police station and no one is interested in this?
translation.zh:
真的，我们身在警察局
没人对这感兴趣吗？

translation.en: -So then what happened? -What do you think happened?
translation.zh:
-那么，接下来怎么办？
-你觉得怎么办？

translation.en: I woke up, took the belt off my neck, got in my car and got out of there.
translation.zh:
我醒来，摘下脖子上的领带
坐进车里，从那儿出来

translation.en: Talk about a wild weekend, right?
translation.zh: 一个狂野的周末，是吗？

translation.en: I thought I was gonna have to shoot my way out.
translation.zh: 我想我得开枪打出条路来

translation.en: What are you gonna do, you know? Bar mitzvahs.
translation.zh:
你会怎么做？
犹太成人礼

translation.en: What the hell is this?
translation.zh: 这他妈是什么？

translation.en: It's my car. It's a Prius.
translation.zh: 我的车，丰田普锐斯

translation.en: I feel like we're literally driving around in a vagina.
translation.zh: 我感觉我们正在阴道里

translation.en: Detective Hoitz and Gamble are on that 518 on East 10th.
translation.zh: 警探霍伊茨和甘布尔正前往东十街518号

translation.en: Negatory, Martin and Fosse, two minutes out.
translation.zh:
不必了，马丁和福斯
已经出来两分钟了

translation.en: We'll just see who's there first.
translation.zh: 看看我们谁先到

translation.en: You stay out of our crime scene! You hear me?
translation.zh:
滚出我们的犯罪现场！
你听见了吗？

translation.en: Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 快，快，快！

translation.en: You feel that, Allen? That tingling in your balls?
translation.zh:
你感觉到了吗，艾伦？
你觉得兴奋了吗？

translation.en: Butterflies in your stomach?
translation.zh: 心里扑腾扑腾的？

translation.en: Are you sure you don't have testicular cancer?
translation.zh: 你确定你没得睾丸癌？

translation.en: I got something to get you going.
translation.zh: 我有些会让你动起来的东西

translation.en: Let's go do some damage!
translation.zh: 让我们来点破坏吧？

translation.en: Nope.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: What the hell is that?
translation.zh: 那是什么鬼东西？

translation.en: LRB. Little River Band.
translation.zh: LRB, 小河乐队

translation.en: This makes me feel like I'm going shopping for a bra.
translation.zh: 这音乐让我觉得我要买一个训练胸罩

translation.en: You know what? We go with no music, okay?
translation.zh:
你知道吗？
我们不放音乐了，好吗？

translation.en: -Fine. -Say bye.
translation.zh:
-好的
-说再见

translation.en: No, don't say bye....
translation.zh: 不，不要说再见...

translation.en: You just signed your death warrant!
translation.zh:
你刚刚在你自己的死亡许可上签了字
霍伊茨！

translation.en: Allen, punch that accelerator or I will shoot you in the foot!
translation.zh:
艾伦，踩加速
否则我就朝你的脚开枪！

translation.en: America!
translation.zh: 美利坚！

translation.en: Allen! Allen, hit the brake!
translation.zh: 艾伦！艾伦，踩刹车！

translation.en: Seriously, slow down! We're approaching the crime scene!
translation.zh:
认真地，减速！
我们就要到犯罪现场了！

translation.en: -Terry, I'm coming in. -You're gonna smash right through!
translation.zh: 特里，我进来了 你径直冲过警戒带了！艾伦！

translation.en: Dude! What...?
translation.zh: 伙计！什么...

translation.en: That's a lot of cocaine.
translation.zh: 那是很多可卡因

translation.en: Did you yell "America" when you hit the accelerator?
translation.zh: 你加速的时候喊"美利坚"了？

translation.en: Nope. No. No.
translation.zh: 不，没有，没有

translation.en: I've never actually put my foot all the way down...
translation.zh: 事实上我从未那样一脚踩在油门上

translation.en: ...to the ground with the accelerator like that.
translation.zh: 一路开到底

translation.en: It got me slightly aroused.
translation.zh: 那让我有点冲动了

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Way to put your stamp on the crime scene, guys.
translation.zh:
这是你们在犯罪现场留下印记的方式
伙计们

translation.en: -Prius, huh? -Yep, yep.
translation.zh:
-普锐斯，哈？
-是，是的

translation.en: Good mileage?
translation.zh: 不错的里程？

translation.en: -Outstanding. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-非常棒
-是的

translation.en: Did this come with a dental dam?
translation.zh: 这是牙齿咬的吗？

translation.en: -No. -Get it?
translation.zh:
-不是

-他在跟厄肖说话

我得去公园大街2300号

-很明显，但是是什么...天...

没人能够
还没和我妻子做爱就离开我们家！

translation.en: -Is that him? -Yeah!
translation.zh:
-是他吗？
-是的！

translation.en: Oh, my God, they came out of nowhere!

translation.en: -Holy shit! -They chased us 20 miles.

-天啊！
-他们追了我们20英里

translation.en: -You come back here! You get back here! -Allen!

-你回来这里！你回来！

公园大街2300号
是彩票中心

嗯，我们怎么跟毛奇说？

还是半个案子

如果我们找到那个，如果我们追踪它

translation.zh: 发现一些有趣的东西 看起来格雷彻和道森有...

translation.zh: 等等，我得起来

translation.en: I went to war to come back

translation.en: Had their way with her

translation.en: Done?

格雷彻和道森会计公司在
费尔劳恩，新泽西

translation.en: Pretty rinky-dink operation for a guy like that.

translation.en: We're going to Jersey to visit an accounting firm.

translation.en: That's a shitty day.
translation.zh: 差劲的一天

translation.en: And all their fathers were hanged

translation.en: And the children all got pink eye
translation.zh: 他们的父亲都被绞死 孩子们都是粉色的眼睛

你唱那些歌有意思吗？

妈的，我要迟到了
我应该去见我女朋友的

translation.en: All right. Goodbye, buddy.

translation.zh:
我在跳舞，特里
你在这儿做什么？

translation.en: I love you, Francine.

translation.en: If you were with me, you wouldn't be here shaking it for dollar bills!
translation.zh:
如果你和我在一起，你不会
在脱衣舞俱乐部，为了钞票扭动

translation.en: This is a ballet studio, Terry. Okay? These poles are horizontal.

这是一间芭蕾舞室，特里
好吗？这些杆子是水平的

translation.en: He loves you very much, Francine.

-这人是谁？
-你来这儿做什么，艾伦？

translation.zh: 搭档的规矩，我是你的搭档

translation.en: I'm here to support a friend and a work colleague.

这人是谁，你的新男朋友？

translation.en: He is my dance partner, Terry. Okay?

translation.en: I know that this is a big surprise...

但是除了当警察之外
世界上有其他的东西，好吗？

translation.en: You don't think I can do this shit?

translation.en: That was surprisingly good, Terry.

translation.en: -I love you, Francine. -You don't know what love is.
translation.zh:
-我爱你，弗朗辛
-你不知道爱是什么

translation.en: He loves you very much, Francine!

translation.en: I heard it when he said it. Thank you.

translation.en: You know what you're doing? You're killing me.
translation.zh:
你知道你在对我做什么吗？
你让我心痛

translation.en: And don't eyeball me!
translation.zh: 别那样看我，伙计！

translation.en: Running around with this drug addict?

translation.en: Terry!
translation.zh: 特里！

translation.en: He does not approve of your behavior!
translation.zh: 他不认可你的行为！

translation.en: Can you please go?
translation.zh: 你可以离开吗？

translation.en: And you too, creepy guy standing in the door?
translation.zh:
你也是
站在门口的怪人？

translation.en: Let's go, Allen.
translation.zh: 我们走，艾伦

translation.en: I think we all experienced our own ballet today.
translation.zh: 我想我们今天都体验了属于自己的芭蕾

translation.en: The ballet of emotion and feelings.
translation.zh: 情感和感受的芭蕾

translation.en: You're kind of making things worse.
translation.zh: 你把事情弄得更糟

translation.en: -You okay? -Yeah, I'm fine.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-是的，我很好

translation.zh: 嘿，我不知道你会跳舞

当我们还是孩子的时候
我们用那些舞蹈动作来取笑别人

translation.en: ...show them how queer they were, okay?
translation.zh: 来表现他们是多么奇怪，好吗？

translation.en: -You learned to dance sarcastically? -Yeah, I guess.

-你就是那样讽刺地学习跳舞？
-我想是的

translation.en: Stay out of my personal life, okay? The kid flies private.

离我的私生活远一点，好吗？
孩子需要隐私

集中精力到案子上，伙计
明天泽西见

translation.en: All right, Terry.

translation.en: Hey, that was liberating for me. I don't know how it felt for you.

嘿，对我来说有解放感
我不清楚你的感觉怎样

translation.en: Here, check this out. Article from six months ago.
translation.zh:
这里，看这个
六个月以前的报道

translation.en: Talking about how the lottery is looking...

translation.en: ...to invest their $30-billion fund more aggressively.
translation.zh: 进行300亿美元的投资 彩票追求更高回报

translation.en: So he's dealing drugs?

translation.en: No, it's not drugs. This isn't Miami Vice.
translation.zh: 不，这不是毒品，这不是《迈阿密风云》

translation.en: Hey, I got you a gift.
translation.zh: 嘿，我有个礼物给你

translation.en: I just saw something, and I thought of you, and so, I don't want it to be weird.
translation.zh:
我刚才看见些东西，我想到你
于是，我不想它看起来有些奇怪

translation.en: -I just wanted to be nice. -Of course it's weird.
translation.zh: 我只是想友好些 这当然奇怪

translation.en: It's a grown man giving another man a present.
translation.zh: 一个成年男人给另一个男人一份礼物

translation.en: There you go. Open it up.
translation.zh: 给你，打开它

translation.en: It's okay, you're welcome.
translation.zh: 好吧，别客气

translation.en: I like to do things like that.

translation.en: Take a look what it says.
translation.zh: 看看说些什么

translation.en: "FBI. Female body inspector."
translation.zh:
联邦调查局
女性身体检查员

translation.en: You know, because we're both in law enforcement.

你知道
因为我们都在执法部门

translation.en: We both like women.

translation.en: But I got a weird sense of humor. I'm a sick puppy.

但我有着怪异的幽默感
我是只病狗

translation.en: I can't look at it. It makes me laugh so hard.

translation.en: Me too.

translation.en: Real nice. You know, it's all class.

translation.en: -Okay. -Don't do that anymore.
translation.zh:
-好吧
-别再干这样的事了

translation.en: Yeah, believe me, I won't.
translation.zh: 是的，相信我，我不会做了

translation.en: Do you understand what's so funny about it, though?

translation.en: Because it's the FBI, right? It has the same logo, the same shield.
translation.zh:
是联邦调查局，是吗？
有同样的标识，同样的盾牌

translation.en: And at first glance, you're like, it's a mug that says "FBI."

乍看上去，就像是写着
"联邦调查局"的杯子

translation.en: But then at second glance, you're like, "Female Body Inspector"?
translation.zh:
但仔细看看
写着"女性身体检查员"？

translation.en: Get out of town. This is outrageous--
translation.zh: 难以置信，这真令人惊讶...

translation.en: Shut up!
translation.zh: 闭嘴！

translation.en: I'm gonna climb over that anger wall of yours...

translation.en: ...one of these days, and it's gonna be glorious.
translation.zh: 越过你生气的墙 那将是一种荣耀

translation.en: Shouldn't we tell Mauch that we're going?

我们不应该告诉毛奇
我们要去调查这个地方吗？

translation.en: -We're just going to check it out. -I know, but it's procedure.
translation.zh: 为什么？我们只是去查查看 我知道，但是这是程序

translation.en: Terry answers to no one.
translation.zh: 特里不回答任何人

translation.en: I do what I do.
translation.zh: 我做我做的事情

translation.en: What accounting firm is closed at 11 a.m. on a Tuesday?
translation.zh:
什么样的会计公司会在星期二
上午11:00就关门了？

translation.en: This is a shithole.
translation.zh: 这是个屎坑

translation.en: I love bombs.
translation.zh: 我爱炸弹

translation.en: I can't hear! I can't hear!
translation.zh: 我听不到了！我听不到了！

translation.en: There's blood blisters on my hands!
translation.zh: 我手上有血泡！

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦，上帝！

translation.en: How do they walk away in movies without flinching when it explodes behind them?
translation.zh: 在电影里，当炸弹在他们身后爆炸的时候 他们是怎么做到毫不退缩地走开的？

translation.en: There's no way! I call bullshit on that!
translation.zh: 这不可能！我叫那胡扯！

translation.en: When they flew the Millennium Falcon outside of the Death Star...
translation.zh:
当他们在死星外
驾着千年猎鹰飞行的时候

translation.en: ...and it was followed by the explosion, that was bullshit!
translation.zh:
它身后在爆炸
那真是胡扯！

translation.en: Don't you dare badmouth Star Wars! That was all accurate!
translation.zh:
你怎么敢说《星球大战》的坏话！
那都是真实的！

translation.en: I need an MRI.
translation.zh: 我得做一个核磁共振

translation.en: I need an MRI! I've got soft tissue damage.
translation.zh: 我得做一个核磁共振！我软组织损伤

translation.en: No way I don't have soft tissue damage.

不可能
我可没有软组织损伤

translation.en: Please stop.
translation.zh: 请停下来

translation.en: I just wanna go somewhere and breastfeed right now!
translation.zh: 我现在只想去个地方吃奶！

translation.en: Fire Department said it was a gas leak, but no way. That was timed.
translation.zh:
消防局说是瓦斯泄露，但不可能
时间是算好的

translation.en: They didn't wanna kill us, they wanted to scare us.
translation.zh:
他们不想杀死我们
但是他们想吓住我们

translation.en: Yeah, well, they succeeded, okay?
translation.zh: 是的，嗯，他们成功了，是吗？

translation.en: I'm tired of this. All right?
translation.zh: 我受够了，好吗？

translation.en: I'm tired of explosions and people pointing guns at me.
translation.zh:
我受够了爆炸
人们用枪指着我

translation.en: I wanna go back to my desk.
translation.zh: 我想回到办公桌前

translation.en: Guess what? Life gets loud sometimes and messes with your ears.
translation.zh:
猜猜怎么着？生活有时变得很大声
并且折磨你的耳朵

translation.en: You can't escape it by hiding at your desk.

translation.en: You know what? Yes, you can. I've done it for years, okay?
translation.zh:
你知道吗？是的，你可以
我这样做好多年了，是吗？

translation.en: There's no explosions at my desk.
translation.zh: 我的桌子前没有爆炸

translation.en: There's no explosions at my home with my plain wife, in my plain house.
translation.zh:
我和平常的妻子，在我平常的房子里
没有爆炸

translation.en: What are you afraid of, man?
translation.zh: 你还怕什么，伙计？

translation.en: I'm your partner. You can tell me. What the hell are you hiding from?
translation.zh:
我是你的搭档，你可以跟我说
你究竟在躲避什么？

translation.en: I was a sophomore in college.
translation.zh: 在我大学二年级的时候

translation.en: The university I went to decided they needed to raise tuition.
translation.zh: 我上的学校决定上涨学费

translation.en: A classmate of mine, Brenda, in an effort to raise money and stay in school...
translation.zh:
我的一个同学，布兰达
为了赚钱继续上学

translation.en: ...came up with a nifty plan...
translation.zh: 想出了一个绝妙的计划

translation.en: ...where she'd date guys and charge them money.
translation.zh:
她想和男生们约会
向他们收费

translation.en: I go on dates all the time...
translation.zh: 我一直和一大群

translation.en: ...with a whole bunch of boys and stuff.
translation.zh: 男生有约会

translation.en: And I need somebody to help me out, like my partner in crime.
translation.zh:
我需要有人把我拯救出来
就像，犯罪的搭档一样

translation.en: -Yeah, I could make a schedule. -Yeah, that's what I was thinking.
translation.zh: 是的，我可以做一个时间安排 耶，那正是我所想的

translation.en: -Provide transportation services. -Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh:
-提供运输服务
-耶，耶

translation.en: -It's gonna be good. -Thanks for asking me.
translation.zh:
-这将会是一段美好的时光
-非常感谢你邀请我

translation.en: She needed help to make sure the dates went okay...
translation.zh:
她说她需要我的帮助来确定约会
顺利进行

translation.en: and that the guys paid her. She said she'd give me a percentage.
translation.zh:
并且男生们付钱给她
她说她会给我分红

translation.en: -Oh, my God. You were a pimp. -What? God, no.
translation.zh:
-哦，上帝，你是皮条客
-什么？上帝啊，不

translation.en: No, I was just trying to help a friend.
translation.zh: 不，我只是试着帮助一个朋友

translation.en: We started making a lot of money.
translation.zh: 我们开始赚很多的钱

translation.en: And wouldn't you know it, some of Brenda's girlfriends...
translation.zh:
当然
布兰达的一些女性朋友

translation.en: ...decided they wanted to be a part of it.
translation.zh: 决定她们也想参与进来

translation.en: Soon, there were about 14 ladies I was protecting...
translation.zh: 没多久，我就保护着14位女生

translation.en: ...while they gave me money.
translation.zh: 而她们付钱给我

translation.en: That's called a stable of whores.
translation.zh: 那被称作稳定的妓女

translation.en: We decided I shouldn't use my real name. So we came up with the name "Gator."
translation.zh:
我们决定我不应该使用我的真实姓名
于是我们用"盖特"这个名字

translation.en: I'm telling you, you were a pimp.
translation.zh: 我跟你说，你曾是个皮条客

translation.en: No! Are you even listening to the story?
translation.zh: 不！你有没有听这个故事？

translation.en: One day, I wake up and look in the mirror...
translation.zh:
不管怎样，一天
我醒来看着镜子里的自己

translation.en: ...and I don't like what I see.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢自己所看到的

translation.en: I mean, I had gotten out of control, and I didn't even realize it.
translation.zh:
我是说，我失控了
我甚至都没有意识到

translation.en: You can't have a conscience in the pimp game.
translation.zh: 在皮条客的游戏里你不可能有意识

translation.en: One night, two of my girls, Candy and Jolene, said, "We gotta take you in"...
translation.zh:
一天晚上，我最喜欢的两个女孩 坎迪和乔勒尼，说
"我们要你加入进来"

translation.en: ...and they dropped me off at the emergency room.
translation.zh: 她们把我丢在急诊室

translation.en: That's where I met Sheila. I was a mess.
translation.zh: 在那儿我遇见了希拉，我很糟

translation.en: I made a promise to myself and to her that I would never get out of control again.
translation.zh: 我对自己和她发誓我再也不会失控了

translation.en: So as soon as I graduated...
translation.zh: 于是，我一从大学毕业

translation.en: ...I became an accountant for the police department.
translation.zh: 我就进了警察局做会计

translation.en: The most stable job I could think of.
translation.zh: 是我能想到的最稳定的工作

translation.en: An accountant for law and order.
translation.zh: 为法律和秩序而战的会计

translation.en: I just don't wanna ever feel out of control like that ever again.
translation.zh: 我只是再也不想像那次一样失去控制了

translation.en: Don't worry. I got your back.
translation.zh: 别担心，我支持你

translation.en: I say we go get in Ershon's grill, see if he cracks.
translation.zh:
现在我们去厄肖的公司
看看他会不会崩溃

translation.en: -I'm tired of all this tippy-toeing around. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-我受够了所有这样偷偷摸摸的事情
-好吧

translation.en: You can either walk the plank or take your panties off.
translation.zh:
你可以选择走木板
要么把裤子脱下来

translation.en: The choice is yours.
translation.zh: 决定权在你

translation.en: -I want to take my panties off. -You've made a wise choice, you have.
translation.zh:
-我想脱裤子
-你做了明智的选择

translation.en: Mr. Ershon, Detective Gamble and the officer who shot Derek Jeter are here.
translation.zh:
厄肖先生，探员甘布尔和
开枪射了德瑞克基特的警官来了

translation.en: Gentlemen, please.
translation.zh: 先生们，请

translation.en: -Remember us, hotshot? -Of course I do. Please, sit.
translation.zh:
-记得我们吗，能人？
-当然，请坐

translation.en: There she blows.
translation.zh: 她吹了

translation.en: Two of those Russian waters, please. No lime wedges, just cucumber.
translation.zh:
请上两杯俄国水
不要加酸橙楔，只加黄瓜

translation.en: Guess where we just came from? An explosion at your accounting office.
translation.zh:
猜猜我们刚从哪里来？
你的会计公司发生爆炸了

translation.en: Yes, that awful gas leak.
translation.zh: 是的，可怕的煤气泄露

translation.en: Gas leak? The only gas leak is the one coming out of your mouth right now.
translation.zh:
煤气泄露？唯一的煤气泄露就是现在
从你的嘴里出来的

translation.en: I just thank God no one was hurt or injured in a bad way.
translation.zh: 我只想感谢上帝没人受伤

translation.en: I absolutely abhor death.
translation.zh: 我非常憎恶死亡

translation.en: Hey, Andrew Lloyd Webber. The jig is up, okay?
translation.zh:
我非常憎恶死亡 嘿，安德鲁洛伊德韦伯
吉格舞结束了，好吗？

translation.en: We know that wasn't your security team that grabbed you.
translation.zh:
我们知道抓你的
不是你的保安小组

translation.en: And we know you're targeting a big fish to cover losses.
translation.zh:
我们还知道你看中一条大鱼
来弥补你的损失

translation.en: You talk or I beat you so it don't show no bruises.
translation.zh:
你自己来说还是让我打你
这样不会显出有淤痕

translation.en: God, this water is good. Terry, have you tried the water?
translation.zh:
你自己来说还是让我打你
这样不会显出有淤痕 上帝啊，这水太棒了
特里，你喝过这水了吗？

translation.en: Shut up, Allen.
translation.zh: 闭嘴，艾伦

translation.en: I assure you, I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh:
我向你保证
我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: I understand there was a bit of a mix-up with the whole scaffolding business.
translation.zh:
我明白在这个脚手架的事情上
有点混乱

translation.en: The cucumber accents the water in such a way that....
translation.zh:
黄瓜突出了水的味道
以至于...

translation.en: Perhaps by way of apology, I can offer you my personal courtside seats...
translation.zh:
为表示歉意
我可以给你们我个人的

translation.en: ...for the Knicks game, with access to the Ambassador Club.
translation.zh:
尼克斯队球赛的内场球票
附带大使俱乐部的入场

translation.en: Come on, Knicks! Come on! I got Knicks' fever and it's catching!
translation.zh:
麦迪逊广场花园 加油，尼克斯队！加油！
我为尼克斯狂并且现在发狂了！

translation.en: Hey. This feels weird sitting here. It feels like it's a bribe.
translation.zh:
嘿，坐在这儿感觉很奇怪
感觉这是贿赂

translation.en: It is a bribe. Son-of-a-bitch, I saw courtside and I went blind.
translation.zh:
这是贿赂，狗娘养的
我看到内场就全然不顾了

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Call me!
translation.zh: 打给我！

translation.en: -Excuse me. -That was a trick.
translation.zh:
-打扰
-那是个小把戏

translation.en: No more.
translation.zh: 别来这套了

translation.en: Gentlemen, you have a choice: Mamma Mia or Jersey Boys.
translation.zh:
先生们，你们可以选择
《妈妈咪呀》还是《泽西男孩》

translation.en: Fantastic! You're so unbelievable!
translation.zh: 棒极了！你简直令人难以置信！

translation.en: Damn it. He did it again.
translation.zh: 妈的，他又来了

translation.en: -Excuse me. -No more tickets.
translation.zh:
-打扰
-别再拿票出来了

translation.en: Mr. Ershon, I tried to keep them in the waiting room.
translation.zh:
厄肖先生
我尽量把他们留在会客室

translation.en: That's okay, Susan. Two Glacier waters with Mediterranean limes.
translation.zh:
好的，苏珊
两杯冰水，加地中海酸橙

translation.en: No, no, no. No more water. We're not here for that.
translation.zh:
不，不，不，别再上水了
我们不是来喝水的

translation.en: No, I was very much looking forward to having a water.
translation.zh: 不，我很想喝杯水

translation.en: -How great is Jersey Boys? -It's not great. It's fantastic!
translation.zh:
-《泽西男孩》怎么样？
-不是怎么样，是棒极了！

translation.en: You totally undersold it. The pageantry, the costumes.
translation.zh:
你完全贬低了它
华丽壮观，那服装

translation.en: Wow, what a musical.
translation.zh: 哇哦，多么棒的音乐

translation.en: Hey. Get over here.
translation.zh: 嗨，过来

translation.en: -What's wrong with you? -What?
translation.zh:
-你有什么问题？
-什么？

translation.en: That's not what we're here for.
translation.zh: 我们来这不是为了那个

translation.en: We're gonna do good cop, bad cop. Okay?
translation.zh: 我们做好警察、坏警察游戏，好吗？

translation.en: It's the oldest game in the book for a reason. It works.
translation.zh:
这成为书上最古老的游戏是有原因的
它奏效

translation.en: I come strong, then you come in.
translation.zh: 我来势汹汹，然后你进来

translation.en: -You got it? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你明白吗？
-是的

translation.en: -I come strong, then you come in. -Right. Got it.
translation.zh:
-我来势汹汹，然后你进来
-好吧，明白了

translation.en: Now you listen to me, you piece of shit.
translation.zh: 现在你听我说，你这坨狗屎

translation.en: It's just you and me, and I'm gonna rip you apart!
translation.zh:
只有你和我
我要撕烂你！

translation.en: How did you cover your losses up? What drug cartel are you working with?
translation.zh:
你是怎么样掩盖损失的？
你现在和哪个毒品集团交易？

translation.en: -Okay, I'll talk to you, you're reasonable! -No, no, look at me!
translation.zh:
-好吧，我和你谈谈，你很理性！
-不，不，看着我！

translation.en: You wanna talk to me? You wanna talk to me?
translation.zh:
你想和我谈谈？
你想和我谈谈？

translation.en: Allen, what are you doing? What are you doing? Allen!
translation.zh:
艾伦，你在做什么？
你在做什么？艾伦！

translation.en: I'm gonna make you eat a plate of human shit!
translation.zh: 我要让你吃下整盘的大便！

translation.en: Get away from me!
translation.zh: 离我远点！

translation.en: Where is he?
translation.zh: 他去哪了？

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry about that.
translation.zh: 瞧，对此我真的是非常抱歉

translation.en: I saw how aggressive you were being, and I thought:
translation.zh:
我看到你是多么地咄咄逼人
我想

translation.en: "Wow, I gotta go even bigger than that, since we're doing bad cop, bad cop."
translation.zh:
"哇哦，我要比那做得更好
因为我们是坏警察，坏警察"

translation.en: What? No, I said, "Good cop, bad cop." I'm the bad cop, you're the good cop.
translation.zh:
什么？不，我说，"好警察，坏警察"
我是坏警察，你是好警察

translation.en: Okay, then there it is. That's it. I thought you said, "Bad cop, bad cop."
translation.zh:
好吧，就是这样，就这样
我以为你说，"坏警察，坏警察"

translation.en: Well, while you were going crazy, look what I snagged from his desk.
translation.zh:
看，在你发飙的时候
我从他桌上搞来了什么

translation.en: -Think it's his phone sheet. -Nice.
translation.zh:
-我觉得是他的电话簿
-好极了

translation.en: Seven calls to the lottery office.
translation.zh: 给彩票中心打了七通电话

translation.en: That could be the evidence we need for Mauch.
translation.zh: 那会是我们要给毛奇找的证据

translation.en: -Get back. Colombian drug lords. -Where are you getting that from?
translation.zh:
-回来，哥伦比亚毒枭
-你从哪弄到那东西的？

translation.en: Jesus!
translation.zh: 上帝啊！

translation.en: Can you imagine where you'd be in your career if you hadn't shot Jeter?
translation.zh:
你能想象如果不是因为朝基特开了枪
你现在事业会发展得怎样呢？

translation.en: -We call this in, right? -We got all the evidence we need.
translation.zh:
-我们把这个算进来，是吧？
-好像我们已经有了所需要的所有证据

translation.en: I'm sorry, my butterfly.
translation.zh: 对不起了，我的蝴蝶

translation.en: We'll load them up, send them back to go.
translation.zh: 我们把他们弄上车，然后送走

translation.en: -Holy shit. -What?
translation.zh:
-狗屎
-怎么了？

translation.en: What do you mean, what? Where are we?
translation.zh:
你什么意思，什么？
我们在哪儿？

translation.en: We're in the high desert.
translation.zh: 我们在荒漠里

translation.en: They took my shoes again, man! What the hell is it with taking shoes?
translation.zh:
他们又拿走了我们的鞋子，伙计！
拿走鞋到底要干什么？

translation.en: -They took your wooden gun? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-他们拿走了你的木头手枪？
-是的

translation.en: -Hello? -Hello, Gene? I mean, captain.
translation.zh:
-哈罗？
-哈罗，基因？我是说，警长

translation.en: Captain, it's Allen Gamble.
translation.zh: 警长，我是艾伦甘布尔

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Where are you? What's going on?
translation.zh:
是，是，你们在哪里？
发生什么事了？

translation.en: Captain, it's a long story, but I'm just gonna cut to the chase.
translation.zh:
警长，说来话长，
但是我要说重点了

translation.en: We are in Las Vegas, all right?
translation.zh: 我们在拉斯维加斯，好吧？

translation.en: We were kidnapped, put on a freight train, and shipped out here.
translation.zh:
我们被绑架了，扔到了运货列车上
来到了这个地方

translation.en: Let me just stop you right there. Don't bullshit me.
translation.zh:
我打住你们一下
别跟我鬼扯

translation.en: Captain, I am being straight with you.
translation.zh: 警长，我跟你直说

translation.en: Look, we think something's going on, okay?
translation.zh: 瞧，我们认为会有事情发生，好吗？

translation.en: We think Ershon is targeting the lottery to cover his losses.
translation.zh:
我们认为厄肖的目标是用彩票
掩盖他的损失

translation.en: Wait. How many times did I explicitly say to you, "Lay off Ershon"?
translation.zh:
等等，我跟你们明确地说过多少次了
"别去碰厄肖"？

translation.en: Terry, Captain wants to know...
translation.zh: 特里，警长想知道

translation.en: ...how many times has he asked us to lay off Ershon.
translation.zh: 他跟我们说过多少次要别去碰厄肖

translation.en: Twice.
translation.zh: 两次

translation.en: Twice. Terry says twice. I agree.
translation.zh: 两次，特里说两次，我同意

translation.en: I'm hanging up. I'm done.
translation.zh: 我要挂了，我说完了

translation.en: I gotta tell you, I started getting a hand for that, a taste for that Pai Gow.
translation.zh: 我告诉你，我已经动手了，玩牌九的风格

translation.en: Martin and Fosse, super cops, in three, two....
translation.zh:
马丁和福斯，超级警察
三，二...

translation.en: So we busted that junkie. Got back 74 thou in diamonds. Seventy-four thou.
translation.zh:
于是，我们搜查了那个瘾君子
追回了价值74,000美元的钻石，7万4

translation.en: Solved the Castien case.
translation.zh: 侦破了加斯第安劫案

translation.en: Seventy-four thousand dollars? That's all they took?
translation.zh: 74,000美元？那是他们抢走的全部？

translation.en: There's millions of dollars of diamonds in that place.
translation.zh: 那地方有几千万美元的钻石

translation.en: How about this, Gamble? How about you shut your face?
translation.zh:
这个怎么样，甘布尔？
把你嘴闭上如何？

translation.en: All right? Just shut it.
translation.zh: 好吧？那就闭上

translation.en: Hoitz, Gamble, captain's looking for you.
translation.zh: 霍伊茨，甘布尔，警长找你们

translation.en: I know it's off the subject, but is Kevlar copyrighted?
translation.zh:
我知道有点跑题
但复制纤维B有版权吗？

translation.en: -Captain? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-警长？
-是的

translation.en: -Is it a bad time? -No, come on. Come on.
translation.zh:
-时候不对？
-不，继续，继续

translation.en: -Not me, right? -Yeah, and you.
translation.zh:
-不是我，是吗？
-是的，还有你

translation.en: Fellows, I'm sure you're familiar with the venerable DA Radford.
translation.zh:
伙计们，我相信你们熟悉令人敬重的
地方法院检查官莱德福特

translation.en: -He wanted to come and pay us a visit. -Hello, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 他想过来和我们见一面 嗨，先生们

translation.en: -Hello, sir. -Hey.
translation.zh:
-嗨，长官
-嗨

translation.en: -You know, I was talking to Gene here. -He prefers "captain."
translation.zh:
-你知道，我正和基因说话
-他更喜欢"警长"

translation.en: Yes, I was talking to Gene here, and, you know, it's funny.
translation.zh:
是的，我正和基因讲话
并且，你知道，这很有趣

translation.en: I don't know what you two have been up to...
translation.zh: 我不知道你们两个在调查什么

translation.en: ...but I've been getting calls from people I don't ever get calls from.
translation.zh:
但是我接到了一些电话
从一些根本不会给我打电话的人们

translation.en: In 40 years of enforcing the law, I've learned one thing.
translation.zh:
在40年的执法过程中
我学到一件事

translation.en: When that happens, stop.
translation.zh: 当那发生时，停下

translation.en: -Gene, how's the family? -Good, good, Louis, thanks for asking.
translation.zh:
-基因，你的家人怎么样？
-很好，很好，路易斯，谢谢您的问候

translation.en: -My son's bisexual, so.... -Tremendous.
translation.zh:
-我的儿子是双性恋，所以...
-好极了

translation.en: Gentlemen, do we understand each other?
translation.zh: 先生们，你们明白吗？

translation.en: -Cut the crap! -Will do.
translation.zh:
-别干蠢事
-会的

translation.en: Guy never comes down here.
translation.zh: 那家伙从不下楼来这儿

translation.en: Twenty years, I think I've seen that guy in this building one time.
translation.zh:
二十年来，我想我在这桩大楼里只看见
那家伙一次

translation.en: -He's a heavyweight cat, that guy. -He was sitting right here.
translation.zh:
-他是只胖猫，那个家伙
-他就坐在那里

translation.en: Yeah. I think you missed the point. Anyway, look.
translation.zh:
是的，我想你跑题了
管他呢，瞧

translation.en: Blue and white found your firearms down by the Hudson River. Here you go, Terry.
translation.zh:
巡警在哈德逊河下游找到了你的枪
给你，特里

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna hang on to the wooden gun.
translation.zh: 我要收回那把木头枪

translation.en: -To give me back my real gun? -No.
translation.zh:
-把我的真枪还给我？
-不

translation.en: Because I'm gonna give you this.
translation.zh: 因为我要给你这个

translation.en: It's a rape whistle. You blow that if you run into any trouble...
translation.zh:
是一个紧急哨
如果你遇到了麻烦你就吹哨

translation.en: ...and someone with an actual gun will come and help you out.
translation.zh: 佩戴真枪的人就会来帮助你

translation.en: We were abducted, captain! This shit is real! Ershon's dirty. He's targeting the lottery!
translation.zh:
我们被绑架了，警长！这是真的！
厄肖有犯罪，他的目标是彩票！

translation.en: Next, I want you guys to hand in all the evidence you think you have to the SEC.
translation.zh:
下一步，我想要你们把你们认为
所有是证据的东西交给证券交易委员会

translation.en: The financial district's under their jurisdiction.
translation.zh: 金融事件是他们的管辖范围

translation.en: Don't you get it? This case is talking to us!
translation.zh: 难道你不明白吗？这个案件属于我们！

translation.en: I'm a peacock, captain! You gotta let me fly on this one!
translation.zh:
我是一只孔雀，警长！
这次你要让我飞起来！

translation.en: You know what, Terry? Let's just settle this. Peacocks don't fly.
translation.zh:
你知道吗，特里？我们把这个讲清楚
孔雀不会飞

translation.en: -They fly, they fly a little bit. -Yeah, about as much as a penguin.
translation.zh:
-它们会飞，会飞一点
-是的，就像企鹅那样

translation.en: One more thing, do me a favor, don't go chasing waterfalls.
translation.zh:
-它们会飞，会飞一点
-是的，就像企鹅那样 还有一件事，帮我一个忙
不要去追逐瀑布

translation.en: Was that accidental, or were you trying to quote TLC on purpose?
translation.zh:
那是意外，
还是你有意引用TLC的歌词？

translation.en: I don't even understand the reference.
translation.zh: 我甚至不知道那个出处

translation.en: -You don't understand what you said? -I don't know what that is.
translation.zh:
-你不明白你说的是什么？
-我不知道那是什么

translation.en: Get out. Go.
translation.zh: 出去，出去

translation.en: How did they get that story?
translation.zh: 他们是怎么知道那个故事的？

translation.en: I'm tired of being treated like a jerk for trying to do the right thing.
translation.zh:
我厌倦了尝试去做正确的事情
却被像傻瓜一样对待

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿，伙计们

translation.en: There's a proxy vote for a big reinvestment of the pension coming up...
translation.zh:
这有一个为养老金再投资发起的
代理投票活动

translation.en: -...so if you just wanna come by the old.... -Damn it, Bob!
translation.zh:
-所以如果你们刚好想拜访老...
-妈的，鲍勃！

translation.en: Let me ask you something.
translation.zh: 让我问你些事情

translation.en: What do you even do around here besides interrupt people?
translation.zh: 除了在这儿打扰别人你还会做什么？

translation.en: Well, I serve as treasurer to the union.
translation.zh: 嗯，我是工会的出纳

translation.en: I make a wicked pot of decaf.
translation.zh: 我做一大壶脱咖啡因咖啡

translation.en: Exactly! You're a worthless piece of shit!
translation.zh: 完全正确！你是个完全没用的狗屎！

translation.en: Probably right, Terry. That's why I feel so sad all the time.
translation.zh:
可能是吧，特里
那正是我一直感觉很糟的原因

translation.en: I'm gonna go for a walk.
translation.zh: 我要出去走走

translation.en: -Bob! -Say something.
translation.zh:
-鲍勃！
-讲点什么

translation.en: Come on! Bob!
translation.zh: 来吧！鲍勃！

translation.en: I didn't mean it, all right? I'm upset.
translation.zh: 我不是存心的，好吗？我很郁闷

translation.en: These braised short ribs taste like a dog's asshole.
translation.zh: 这些炖的小排骨吃起来就像是狗屁股一样

translation.en: -Sweetie. -You know what? I'm sitting here thinking:
translation.zh:
-宝贝
-你知道吗，我坐在这儿想

translation.en: "Who in the world would slow roast a dog's asshole...
translation.zh: "世上谁会去慢烤狗屁股

translation.en: ...and serve it to their husband?"
translation.zh: 然后给她们的丈夫吃呢？"

translation.en: -You would. -You are being awful. What's wrong?
translation.zh:
-你会
-你很差劲，出什么事了？

translation.en: -Captain took us off the case. -I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
-警长不让我们办案了
-我很抱歉

translation.en: I told Terry about my dark days in college, and it brought up some feelings.
translation.zh:
我把大学时的黑暗日子讲给特里听
这唤起了一些感觉

translation.en: Well, honeydick, that was a long time ago. You're not that same person you were.
translation.zh:
嗯，宝贝，那是很久以前了
你不再是同一个人了

translation.en: No, you don't get it. There is a darkness inside of me.
translation.zh:
不，你不明白
我有阴暗的内在

translation.en: It wants to get out. It wants to walk around.
translation.zh:
它想出来
它想走出来

translation.zh: ...或者是侦破亿万级的美元欺诈案

translation.en: -Do you work here? -Yeah, I do.
translation.zh:
-你在这儿工作吗？
-是的

translation.en: The wrecking ball that crashed into Castien down there.
translation.zh: 在那儿落锤破碎球砸进了加斯第安珠宝店

translation.en: They also did damage to your office?
translation.zh: 他们也给你的办公室造成了损失？

translation.en: Some police officers came by and sealed it off.
translation.zh: 一些警官来了把它封锁起来

translation.en: Do you recall what they looked like?
translation.zh: 你能想起他们看起来是什么样子吗？

translation.en: One of them had an Australian accent.
translation.zh: 他们中的一个有澳大利亚口音

translation.en: You don't happen to do any business for the state lottery, do you?
translation.zh: 你不是碰巧为国家彩票服务吧，是吗？

translation.en: No. Our main client is Lendl Global.
translation.zh: 不是，我们的主要客户是兰德国际

translation.en: Can I ask what this is about?
translation.zh: 我能问问这个是什么吗？

translation.en: Gator needs his gat, you punkass bitch!
translation.zh: 盖特需要他的手枪，你这个没用的婊子！

translation.en: Because that's what a real cop is.
translation.zh: 因为那才是一个真正的警察

translation.en: No, I didn't say "Lock her up." I never said, "Lock her up."
translation.zh:
不，我没有说"把她铐起来"
我从没有说，"把她铐起来"

translation.en: A guy who does what needs to be done.
translation.zh: 一个去做需要完成的事情的人

translation.en: A guy who knows how to use his dark side for good.
translation.zh: 一个知道如何正确利用他的阴暗面的人

translation.en: And then you move to Florida.
translation.zh: 然后你就搬到佛罗里达

translation.en: One, two, three, attack!
translation.zh: 一、二、三，袭击！

translation.en: Terry, it's me.
translation.zh: 特里，是我

translation.en: -Tap out. Tap out. -It's me, Allen.
translation.zh:
-敲出来，敲出来
-是我，艾伦

translation.en: Are you tapping out, or are you hitting me in the face?
translation.zh:
你是在敲出来
还是在打我的脸？

translation.en: I'm tapping you out!
translation.zh: 我在敲出来！

translation.en: You crazy? What are you doing, man?
translation.zh: 你疯了吗？你在做什么，伙计？

translation.en: -They might be watching us. -Could've killed you.
translation.zh:
-他们可能正在看着我们
-可以杀了你

translation.en: -Turn out the lights. Could be watching. -Who?
translation.zh:
-把灯关了
-什么？ -他们可能在看着我们
-谁？

translation.en: I found some big information, okay?
translation.zh: 我有些重大消息，好吗？

translation.en: -About what? -Some scary shit, Terry. This is big.
translation.zh:
-关于什么？
-一些骇人的狗屎，特里，是大事件

translation.en: How'd you get in here? This place is foolproof.
translation.zh:
你怎么进来的？
这里是不会让蠢蛋进来的

translation.en: -We can't be too careful. -What are you talking about?
translation.zh:
-我们再小心也不为过
-你在说什么？

translation.en: -This place might be bugged. -There's no bugs in here.
translation.zh:
-这个地方可能有窃听器
-这儿没有窃听器

translation.en: First off, I missed you.
translation.zh: 首先，我想念你

translation.en: -What's going on? -Did you hear what I said?
translation.zh:
-发生什么事了？
-你听见我说什么了吗？

translation.en: -Fine, I kind of missed you too. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-好吧，我也有点想念你
-谢谢

translation.en: Okay. I found out whose losses Ershon has to cover.
translation.zh: 好吧，我发现了厄肖要赔偿谁的损失

translation.en: -It's Lendl Global. -What?
translation.zh:
-是兰德国际
-什么？

translation.en: Lendl staged the Castien robbery as a distraction...
translation.zh:
兰德在幕后策划加斯第安劫案
来分散注意

translation.en: ...so they could break into their own accounting firm next door.
translation.zh:
这样他们就可以潜进
自己隔壁的会计公司

translation.en: They then altered all the records to cover the losses...
translation.zh: 他们偷换了所有的记录来掩盖损失

translation.en: ...that Ershon had cost them through all of his bad investments.
translation.zh: 那些损失都是厄肖糟糕的投资造成的

translation.en: You're not supposed to be doing this. You're supposed to be walking the beat.
translation.zh:
你不应该在做这个事情
你应该正在街上执勤

translation.en: I know. Pretty tricky, though, huh?
translation.zh: 我知道，很复杂，哈？

translation.en: This is bad, Allen. This is bad.
translation.zh: 这不好，艾伦，这不好

translation.en: No wonder the captain wanted us to stay out of this.
translation.zh: 警长当然想要我们置身事外

translation.en: Yeah, I bet Beaman started asking questions.
translation.zh: 是的，我打赌比曼看出问题了

translation.en: -That's why they killed him. -Man.
translation.zh:
-那就是他们为什么要杀了他
-伙计

translation.en: Here's the other thing.
translation.zh: 还有一件事

translation.en: Tomorrow, there's a massive business deal going down.
translation.zh: 明天，将会有一笔重大交易

translation.en: Ershon's leading it.
translation.zh: 厄肖牵头的

translation.en: I still can't figure out who the poor sucker is they're making the deal with...
translation.zh:
我还是不知道谁是那个可怜的倒霉鬼
和他们做交易

translation.en: but we gotta stop it.
translation.zh: 但是我们得阻止它

translation.en: It's time to let the peacock fly.
translation.zh: 是孔雀飞的时候了

translation.en: I'm not going, Allen. I like what I do.
translation.zh: 我不去，艾伦，我喜欢我做的事情

translation.en: So do I. We're cops.
translation.zh: 我也是，我们是警察

translation.en: No. I like what I do now. I like working traffic. It's a great gig.
translation.zh:
不，我喜欢我现在做的事情
我喜欢指挥交通，是项很棒的娱乐活动

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I like working traffic. I'm not going with you.
translation.zh: 我喜欢交通警察的工作，我不会和你去的

translation.en: What is this traffic bullshit?
translation.zh: 这交通是什么狗屎？

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -I'm talking about my life.
translation.zh:
-你在说什么呢？
-我在说我的生活

translation.en: The corner I run on 54th and 3rd Avenue? It hums.
translation.zh:
是第54街和第3大道的交通路口？
那里塞车了

translation.en: It's Terry's intersection. And the traffic guys? They're good guys.
translation.zh:
那是特里的十字路口
那些交通警察？他们是好人

translation.en: There's this one guy, Phillip? He can pee in the urinal from 20 feet.
translation.zh:
还有个叫菲利浦？
他能从20英尺外尿进便池

translation.en: You've gotta see it, Allen. You've got to.
translation.zh: 你得见见，艾伦，你得见见

translation.en: What happened to you? What happened to this being our time?
translation.zh:
你怎么了？
我们一起的时间怎么了？

translation.en: No way, Allen. I'm out. I'm done.
translation.zh: 没门，艾伦，我不干，结束了

translation.en: -Get in the car. -Come on. We both know it's wooden.
translation.zh:
-上车
-快，艾伦，我们都知道那是木头的

translation.en: -Apartment pop. Now get in the car. -You're not gonna shoot me.
translation.zh:
-公寓开枪，现在上车来
-你不会开枪射我的

translation.en: Okay, I'll be honest. This is only the second time I've ever fired this.
translation.zh:
好吧，我说实话
这只是我第二次开枪

translation.en: So stop pointing it at me.
translation.zh: 那么别用枪指着我了

translation.en: Look, tomorrow morning, all I know is I'm going to Mauch, all right?
translation.zh:
看，明天早上，
我会去毛奇那儿，好吗？

translation.en: For what? He doesn't care.
translation.zh: 为什么？他不在乎

translation.en: He's been dodging this case for too long and I want answers.
translation.zh:
他逃避这个案子太久了
我要的是答案

translation.en: I want him to look me in the eye and tell me why.
translation.zh:
我想要让他看着我的眼睛
并且告诉我为什么

translation.en: Turn on the news, man. Nobody cares.
translation.zh: 打开新闻，伙计，没人在乎

translation.en: I hope I'm not alone.
translation.zh: 我希望我并不孤单

translation.en: Hope you bring it.
translation.zh: 希望你带着它

translation.en: We got a big day out there. Big one.
translation.zh: 今天是个大日子，大日子

translation.en: We got a full moon. People are gonna be amped, all right?
translation.zh:
我们有满月
人们会被放大，对吗？

translation.en: Let's see what we got on hot tips, all right?
translation.zh: 来看看从热门提示里能得到什么，对吗？

translation.en: The new bathmats are in.
translation.zh: 新的浴室防滑垫到货了

translation.en: One more thing. We got a serial rapist in Crown Heights.
translation.zh:
还有就是皇冠高地
出现了一名连环作案的强奸犯

translation.en: Jeez, I'm sorry. That's from my other job. Ignore that. Forget that.
translation.zh:
神啊，我很抱歉，那是我的另一项工作
别在意，把它忘了

translation.en: Well, don't ignore it.
translation.zh: 嗯，别忽略它

translation.en: If you live in Crown Heights, you know, walk in pairs.
translation.zh:
如果你住在皇冠高地
你知道的，两人出行

translation.en: Gene Mauch to kitchen accessories. Gene Mauch to kitchen accessories.
translation.zh:
基因毛奇到厨房配件部
基因毛奇到厨房配件部

translation.en: I gotta go. Go get them. Let's be careful out there.
translation.zh:
我要走了，去抓他们
我们到那儿得小心点

translation.en: The oak.
translation.zh: 橡木

translation.en: I like to keep the oak together and the maple separately, okay?
translation.zh:
我喜欢把橡木放在一起保存
而把枫叶分开，好吗？

translation.en: And these chopping boards?
translation.zh: 这些是切菜板吗？

translation.en: Hey, captain.
translation.zh: 嘿，警长

translation.en: Hey, Allen. Hey, how you doing?
translation.zh: 嘿，艾伦，嘿，你怎么样？

translation.en: What are you doing here? Are you here for the bathmats?
translation.zh:
你来这儿做什么？
你是为了买浴室防滑垫来的？

translation.en: -I need you to be straight with me. -Straight with us.
translation.zh:
-你跟我得直接点
-直接点

translation.en: Hey, Terry. Look at this.
translation.zh: 嘿，特里，看这个

translation.en: -I thought you were working traffic today. -Let them block the box.
translation.zh:
-我以为你今天会是交通警
-让他们封锁街区

translation.en: -Besides, partners' code, right? -Thanks.
translation.zh:
-还有，搭档规矩，是吗？
-谢谢

translation.en: Hey, why have you worked your ass off trying to kill this case?
translation.zh: 嘿，你为什么要封杀这个案子呢？

translation.en: All right, fine. I'm gonna tell you guys something.
translation.zh:
好吧，好的
我来告诉你们一些事情

translation.en: You really went into deep water on this one. You really went in deep.
translation.zh:
这一回你们淌了一潭深水
你们陷得太深了

translation.en: Ershon's connected to all the higher ups...
translation.zh: 厄肖和上面所有的人都有关系

translation.en: ...and I gotta save what little ass I have left, okay?
translation.zh: 我在拯救自己，好吗？

translation.en: You keep hiding from shit in the world...
translation.zh: 你一直在回避世上的狗屎

translation.en: ...and eventually the world comes to your front door.
translation.zh: 最后世界来到你的前门

translation.en: -Nice. -That's very nice.
translation.zh:
-棒极了
-那非常棒

translation.en: I heard it in an episode of Touched By An Angel.
translation.zh:
我从《天使在人间》的
一段插曲中听来的

translation.en: You keep this thing real quiet, and you make sure you have real evidence...
translation.zh:
你让这事情真的平静下来
你要确定你有真正的证据

translation.en: ...and maybe I'll see what I can do.
translation.zh: 或许来看看我能做什么

translation.en: But if you make a lot of noise...
translation.zh: 但是如果你弄出许多声响

translation.en: ...and you attract the media attention, and you bring the DA in on this...
translation.zh:
并且引起了媒体的注意
把地方检察官牵扯进来

translation.en: ...I am out, okay?
translation.zh: 我就退出，好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we'll go in there like church mice.
translation.zh: 好，我们像教堂里的老鼠一样悄无声息

translation.en: But there's one case, one case in a career where you go all in.
translation.zh:
但是有一种情况
在警察生涯里碰到这种情况你们都会进去

translation.en: This is it.
translation.zh: 就是这个

translation.en: All right. Then you do us proud.
translation.zh: 好吧，那么给我们演出好戏

translation.en: Because I don't want no scrubs.
translation.zh: 因为我可不想有差错

translation.en: -Really? -No.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-不

translation.en: -You're not aware that's a TLC song? -I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh:
-你没有意识到那是一首TLC组合的歌？
-我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: -Second time. -You said chasing waterfalls...
translation.zh:
-第二次
-你说过追逐瀑布

translation.en: ...now you're saying you don't want no scrubs.
translation.zh: 现在你却说你不想有差错

translation.en: -I don't even understand the reference. -It's like a tic.
translation.zh:
-我甚至都不明白这个引用
-这就像痉挛

translation.en: I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 我不知道你在说些什么

translation.en: Remember, this thing gets messy, we never talked.
translation.zh:
记住，这件事变得糟糕起来
我们从没谈起过

translation.en: -You can trust us. -Real quiet.
translation.zh:
-你可以信任我们
-要真的没有动静

translation.en: You gotta creep. Creep.
translation.zh: 你变得怪怪的，很奇怪

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 得了吧

translation.en: You don't say "Creep-creep" unless you're quoting TLC.
translation.zh:
除非你是引用TLC组合的话
否则你不会说"怪怪的-怪怪的"

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿，伙计们

translation.en: You know Danson and Highsmith were not good cops, right?
translation.zh:
你们知道
道森和海史密斯不是好警察，是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I guess we kind of knew that, but it's a drag.
translation.zh:
是的，我想我们知道些
但是这真是件无聊的事

translation.en: I mean, at a certain point, who's left to be a hero?
translation.zh:
我是说，从某一点来说
剩下的人谁会成为英雄呢？

translation.en: Not to be corny, maybe it's you guys.
translation.zh: 别老套了，也许就是你们

translation.en: You ready?
translation.zh: 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Let's go.
translation.zh:
-是的
-我们走

translation.en: -No, but the highlights are great. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-不，但是最精彩的部分棒极了
-谢谢

translation.en: -Sexy but serious. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-性感而严肃
-谢谢

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 打扰一下

translation.en: Who the hell are all these people? I was only expecting one man.
translation.zh:
这些人究竟是谁？
我只等一个人

translation.en: You know, they're just some people I owe money to who wanted to be here.
translation.zh:
你知道的，他们只是一些想来这儿
问我要回欠款的人

translation.en: Who are they?
translation.zh: 他们是谁？

translation.en: Well, they are some Chechen patriots, entrepreneurs.
translation.zh: 嗯，他们是一些车臣爱国者，企业家

translation.en: And the black chaps are some businessmen from Nigeria.
translation.zh: 那些黑人是一些从尼日利亚来的商人

translation.en: You owe money to the Nigerians and Chechens?
translation.zh: 你欠尼日利亚和车臣人的钱？

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I do.
translation.zh: 是的，是的，我欠他们钱

translation.en: -You're a piece of work. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-你真是个人才
-谢谢

translation.en: Probably best to get started.
translation.zh: 最好现在开始

translation.en: This is good, baby. We're in the game, we know the score.
translation.zh:
这很好，宝贝
我们开始比赛，我们知道比分

translation.en: The only thing that bugs me is we still don't know who Ershon's targeting.
translation.zh:
唯一让我烦扰的是
我们仍然不知道厄肖的目标是什么

translation.en: -Is it the lotto? Who is it? -Who cares? Some rich prick.
translation.zh:
-是乐透吗？那是谁？
-谁在乎？一些有钱的蠢货

translation.en: I have to tell you, I am tremendously excited by this deal.
translation.zh:
我得告诉你
我对这个交易非常的兴奋

translation.en: And I can assure you that every dime of your money...
translation.zh:
我能向你保证
你的每分钱

translation.en: ...will be invested with the utmost diligence.
translation.zh: 都会被投资得相当小心

translation.en: Your rates of return are really exciting.
translation.zh: 你的收益非常丰厚

translation.en: We think our members are gonna be just thrilled.
translation.zh: 我想我们的成员会非常的高兴

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, we've averaged, like, 18 percent over the last 10 years.
translation.zh:
是的，我们比过去十年
平均增长了18%

translation.en: All right. Quiet as a church mouse, in and out.
translation.zh:
好的
像教堂的老鼠，悄无声息

translation.en: I can feel that tingling in my balls you were talking about.
translation.zh: 我能感受得到你所说的睾丸里的刺痛感

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.zh: 漂亮

translation.en: All right, listen up.
translation.zh: 好的，听好

translation.en: I am Detective Gamble. This is Detective Hoitz.
translation.zh:
我是警探甘布尔
这是警探霍伊茨

translation.en: We need your cooperation.
translation.zh: 我们需要您的合作

translation.en: David Ershon.
translation.zh: 戴维厄肖

translation.en: You're under arrest for fraud, embezzlement...
translation.zh: 你因涉嫌诈骗，挪用公款被捕

translation.en: ...and in connection to the murder of Don Beaman.
translation.zh: 以及和道恩比曼的谋杀案有关联

translation.en: This is a bad idea.
translation.zh: 这可不是个好主意

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿，伙计们

translation.en: Bob? What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 鲍勃？你在这儿干什么？

translation.en: I'm investing.
translation.zh: 我在投资

translation.en: Do you remember we talked about that proxy vote a while back?
translation.zh: 记得我们以前谈过的代理投票吗？

translation.en: -This is what it was for. -Holy shit.
translation.zh:
-就是这个
-天啊

translation.en: It's a more aggressive investment strategy for the pension.
translation.zh:
对于养老基金来说
这是一项更激进的投资

translation.en: Allen! We're the suckers. They're targeting the police pension fund.
translation.zh:
艾伦！我们真是衰人
他们的目标是警察养老基金

translation.en: Gentlemen, you're here illegally and without a warrant.
translation.zh:
先生们，你们在这儿是违法的
而且没有搜查令

translation.en: We are within our rights to take action.
translation.zh: 我们在职权范围内执行行动

translation.en: So much for quiet as church mice!
translation.zh: 就像教堂里的老鼠一样那么安静！

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 跑！

translation.en: Who the hell are those guys?
translation.zh: 这些家伙到底是谁？

translation.en: Gentlemen, I can get you obstructed view tickets for Rock of Ages.
translation.zh:
先生们，我可以给你们观看
《摇滚时代》的非全景票

translation.en: Even I admit that's not very tempting, but I'm not made of tickets, God damn it!
translation.zh:
即使我承认那并不怎么诱人，
但我不是票做的，他妈的！

translation.en: Jeanie! Get over here! You, go get in the bloody car.
translation.zh:
杰妮！快过来！
你，赶快上车

translation.en: That's it, mate.
translation.zh: 就是这车，伙计

translation.en: I have had it with this joker and his wooden gun.
translation.zh:
是我和这个讲笑话的小丑的车
还有他的木头手枪

translation.en: They're gonna kill me. And then they will kill you.
translation.zh:
他们会杀了我
然后他们会杀了你

translation.en: -Well, I'm gonna kill you first! -And then they will kill me.
translation.zh:
-那我先把你杀了！
-然后他们会杀了我

translation.en: We have two rogue police officers. They are armed and dangerous...
translation.zh:
有两位行为失常的警官
他们持枪并且极其危险

translation.en: -...and holding David Ershon hostage. -Stupid pricks!
translation.zh:
-挟持戴维厄肖作人质
-愚蠢的有钱人！

translation.en: -It's us, we're good guys! -Exactly. They're the good guys.
translation.zh:
-是我们，我们是好人！
-没错，他们是好人

translation.en: Where do we go? Where do we go?
translation.zh: 我们去哪？

translation.en: I have a small apartment. No one knows about it.
translation.zh:
我有个小公寓
没人知道

translation.en: I use it mainly for my parents and prostitutes.

translation.en: You kill us and you kill Ershon. You're out 30 million dollars.
translation.zh:
你杀了我们和厄肖
你损失了3000万美元

translation.en: -Who's got the golden goose now, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-那现在谁得到金鹅了，哈？
-是的

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 狗屎！

translation.en: He's still valuable with a bullet wound, mate.
translation.zh: 他中了一枪但是还有价值，伙计

translation.en: He immediately called your bluff.
translation.zh: 他立即声称你在吹牛

translation.en: Get up. And kill the police.
translation.zh: 站起来，杀了警察

translation.en: I just wanna make sure I get it right.
translation.zh: 我只是想确认我做得对

translation.en: Did you want this transfer approved or not approved?
translation.zh: 你想批准交易还是不批准？

translation.en: You, mate, I'm gonna kill just for fun.
translation.zh: 你，伙计，我会杀人来找乐子

translation.en: Police, don't move! Drop your weapons!
translation.zh: 警察，别动！放下武器！

translation.en: Drop it, or be dropped, homeboy!
translation.zh: 放下，或者被打到丢下武器，家庭妇男！

translation.en: I hope you like prison food and penis.
translation.zh: 我希望你会喜欢牢饭和那里的阳具

translation.en: -Police! Down on the ground! -Let me see your hands!
translation.zh:
-警察！趴到地上！
-让我看到你的手！

translation.en: -Hey, hey, you okay? -Hey.
translation.zh:
-嘿，嘿，你还好吗？
-嘿

translation.en: Hey, Gene. Captain. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 嘿，基因，警长，我很抱歉

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -That's okay. Don't worry about it.
translation.zh:
-我很抱歉
-没关系，别担心

translation.en: You can call me Gene when we're not in the office.
translation.zh: 在办公室外面你可以叫我基因

translation.en: Okay. Thanks for coming by.
translation.zh: 好的，谢谢来访

translation.en: Attaboy.
translation.zh: 好样的

translation.en: Come on, stay with me. Stay with me.
translation.zh: 来，跟我一起，跟我待在一起

translation.en: We're losing him! We're losing him! He's dying!
translation.zh:
我们要失去他了！我们要失去他了！
他要死了！

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no. I'm just resting. I'm just resting.
translation.zh:
不，不，不，我只是在休息
我只是在休息

translation.en: -I'm sorry. Did I hurt you? -I was just resting.
translation.zh:
-我很抱歉，我伤到你了吗？
-我只是在休息

translation.en: -Are you all right? -Just resting.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-只是在休息

translation.en: Hey, let me tell you something.
translation.zh: 嘿，让我告诉你些事情

translation.en: As far as paperwork goes, we'll take care of it.
translation.zh:
至于材料工作
我们会做的

translation.en: -You know why? -Why?
translation.zh:
-你知道为什么吗？
-为什么？

translation.en: Ain't too proud to beg.
translation.zh: 太骄傲了，不能乞求你

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 算了吧

translation.en: -What? -It's not funny anymore.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-没什么乐子了

translation.en: -I don't know what you're talking about. -TLC references.
translation.zh:
-我不知道你在说什么
-引用TLC

translation.en: Still nothing. I swear to you.
translation.zh: 还是什么都没有，我向你发誓

translation.en: I'm gonna go over and check on Terry. I got a bad knee. Hold on. There you go.
translation.zh:
我要过去看看特里怎么样了
我的膝盖很糟，坚持住，就这样

translation.en: It was the king of the mutt cases...
translation.zh: 这是一个最糟的案件

translation.en: ...but Allen and Terry had worked it like stars.
translation.zh: 但是艾伦和特里把它办得极具星味

translation.en: Within 24 hours of learning about Ershon's scheme...
translation.zh: 在24小时内得知厄肖的计划

translation.en: ...and Lendl's massive losses...
translation.zh: 和兰德的巨额亏损

translation.en: ...the government issued TARP funds to bail out Lendl.
translation.zh: 政府发行TARP基金来紧急援助兰德

translation.en: Lendl is in everything, and we're gonna go everywhere....
translation.zh:
兰德涉足各个领域
而我们也将无处不在...

translation.en: They were too big to fail.
translation.zh: 它们太大了以至于不能倒下

translation.en: Ershon now resides in Palomino Federal Correctional Facility in Florida.
translation.zh:
厄肖现在在佛罗里达的巴洛米诺
联邦教养所

translation.en: He still invests. Currency's just different.
translation.zh: 他仍然从事投资，只是使用的货币不同了

安全监控录像显示
罗杰韦斯利涉嫌与比曼被谋杀一案有关

translation.en: ...by security cam footage which Martin and Fosse hadn't checked.
translation.zh:
安全监控录像显示
罗杰韦斯利涉嫌与比曼被谋杀一案有关 马丁和福斯并没有查看这段录像

translation.en: It only showed the back of their heads.
translation.zh: 录像只拍到了他们的后脑

translation.en: But Allen's Faceback app was able to get a match to their faces.
translation.zh:
但是艾伦的后脸软件
可以将此和他们的脸对应起来

translation.en: Terry married Francine.
translation.zh: 特里娶了弗朗辛

translation.en: He played harp at the reception and it was beautiful.
translation.zh:
他在婚宴上弹了竖琴
弹得非常好

translation.en: He had learned how to play it in the eighth grade...
translation.zh: 那是他在八年级的时候学的

translation.en: ...to make fun of the fairy that lived up the street.
translation.zh: 用来取笑住在街上的男同性恋

translation.en: Terry asked Sheila to be his best man, but she declined.
translation.zh:
特里请希拉作他的伴郎
但是希拉回绝了

translation.en: Let's be honest, we all wanna be superstars and hotshots.
translation.zh:
实话实说
我们都想成为超级明星和能人

translation.en: But guess what.
translation.zh: 但猜怎么着？

translation.en: The people that do the real work, the ones that make the difference...
translation.zh:
那些真正工作的人们
使这个世界变得不同

translation.en: ...you don't see them on TV or on the front page.
translation.zh:
在电视上或者封面上
你看不到他们

translation.en: I'm talking about the day-in, day-outers, the grinders.
translation.zh: 我说的是日以继夜、饱受研磨而工作的人

translation.en: Come on, man, you know who I'm talking about: the other guys.
translation.zh:
来吧，伙计，你知道
我在说什么：二流警探

translation.en: Goldman Sachs. This case is gonna be nasty.
translation.zh:
高盛银行
这个案子将会很讨厌

translation.en: Hi. Cute glasses.
translation.zh: 嗨，帅气的眼镜

translation.en: -What was that? -What?
translation.zh:
-那是什么？
-什么？

translation.en: What? Dude, what is it with you and hot ladies? What's your secret?
translation.zh:
什么？伙计，你和热辣女郎是怎么回事？
你有什么秘密？

translation.en: Honestly, I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 诚实地说，我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: Tell me who you lost your virginity to.
translation.zh: 跟我说说你的处子之身给了谁了

translation.en: She actually became a TV actress. Heather Locklear.
translation.zh:
她后来成为了电视明星
海瑟洛克莱尔

translation.en: Heather Locklear, what?
translation.zh: 海瑟洛克莱尔，什么？

translation.en: -You've heard of her? -Come on!
translation.zh:
-你听说过她吗？
-拜托！

translation.en: -She was much chubbier back then. -I don't get it. I really, I don't get it.
translation.zh:
她那个时候更加丰满
我不明白，我真的，真的搞不懂

translation.en: That was you. You don't have a sense of humor.
translation.zh:
那是你
你没有幽默感

translation.en: I do. I have a wonderful sense of humor.
translation.zh: 我有...我有非常好的幽默感

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna tell you the best joke in the world.
translation.zh:
好吧，我给你讲讲
世界上最棒的笑话

translation.en: -We'll see if you laugh. -Please.
translation.zh:
-来看看你会不会笑
-请吧

translation.en: -I love jokes. -All right.
translation.zh:
-我喜欢笑话
-好吧

translation.en: There was these two guys, all right, partners, best friends.
translation.zh:
有两个家伙
好吧，是搭档，好朋友

translation.en: -Going moose hunting. -Right.
translation.zh:
-去猎麋鹿
-好的

translation.en: Looking around. Everywhere they look, there's no moose.
translation.zh:
他们四处寻找
他们找的地方，都没有麋鹿

translation.en: The guy's like, "You know what? We gotta split up.
translation.zh:
那两个家伙想
"你知道吗？我们还是分头找

translation.en: -"You go this way. You go that way." -Right.
translation.zh: "你来这边，你去那边" 好吧

translation.en: Next thing you know, they lose sight of each other.
translation.zh:
接下来你知道
他们看不到对方了

translation.en: All of a sudden, the guy hears some rumbling in the bushes.
translation.zh:
突然间
其中一个家伙听到灌木丛里有声音

translation.en: -Sure. -He starts heading over that way.
translation.zh:
-当然
-他开始朝那个方向走去

translation.en: Out comes his friend in his orange suit. He's like, "Don't shoot. I'm not a moose."
translation.zh:
他的朋友身着橙衣从灌木丛里走出来说
"别开枪，我不是麋鹿"

translation.en: And the guy readies his weapon, points it right at his face, and:
translation.zh:
另一个人备好了武器，
用枪瞄着他的脸，然后...

translation.en: Shoots the guy.
translation.zh: 开枪了

translation.en: So the guy runs over, he goes, "What are you doing?
translation.zh:
于是他的朋友逃走，边跑边喊
"你在干什么？

translation.en: "I told you I wasn't a moose."
translation.zh: "我告诉你我不是麋鹿"

translation.en: And the guy goes, "I thought you said you were a moose."
translation.zh:
另一个回答说
"我以为你说你是只麋鹿"

translation.en: But he's not a moose.
translation.zh: 但是他不是只麋鹿

translation.en: Get the check-check from Shen-Shen. Let's get out of here.
translation.zh:
去申申那儿查查
我们走吧

translation.en: Stop it. Stop it. Stop it.
translation.zh: 停下，停下，停下

translation.en: And cut.
translation.zh: 停
